items.sentence: They're only $50 with two cans of shoe polish free of charge.
It's strange that she should have come home so late at night.
If you want to eat at Raffle's, you must reserve weeks ahead.
Tom isn't really allergic to cats. He just doesn't like cats.
Which did you learn to play first, the clarinet or the flute?
Tom was going to quit his job, but Mary talked him out of it.
I'm hungry because I haven't eaten anything since last night.
We're renting the room above our garage to a college student.
I didn't realize that Tom wasn't going to be able to do that.
Teachers should never make fun of students who make mistakes.
I might have to come home late. In that case, I'll phone you.
If you hadn't been so brave, you'd probably have been killed.
I'm sorry that I haven't written to you for such a long time.
I'm really happy because I won 10,000 yen at the horse races.
The teacher made Tom sit in the corner because he misbehaved.
I wonder if Tom noticed Mary sitting in the back of the room.
Tom wasn't the only one who was asleep. Mary was asleep, too.
I thought that Tom and Mary were supposed to be in Australia.
I thought that you said Tom didn't live in Australia anymore.
I think that we shouldn't let Tom go to Australia by himself.
